value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What...is this place?$k$pCould it be? No—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|The scenery is very familiar...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Alfonse! Sharena! The enemy is
close. Prepare for battle!$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We have triumphed... But it is our
surroundings that trouble me—not
the enemy we face.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It's Askr. Isn't it, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|So it seems. I suspect that it is not
our Askr, however, but another...$k$pThere must be countless other Askrs
among the realms. It's no surprise
we'd set foot in one eventually.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|But there's no one here! Absolutely
no one at all...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Our scouts have returned from the
west, and they report the same. They
haven't encountered anyone.$k$pAside from us, all anyone has seen
here are the forces of the dead.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Where did everyone go?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We need to get to the bottom of this.
Let's keep moving.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Well hello there. How did your little
scouting mission go, dear?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The forces of Hel are weak. But no
matter how many times they are
killed...they come back.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|There you have it! That's what makes
fighting Hel so scary—the dead can't
die a second time.$k$pAs long as the Death Sovereign
holds fast, there's not much you
can do.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|So...$k$pTell me, Loki.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|What, darling?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|How do I enter the realm of the
dead?$k$pI will go there and kill Hel myself.$k$p$Sbs150|
